questions.prompt: Which method will update an element on the DOM?
Which way allows information to be passed down from the parent to the children?
Which of the following would be good use-cases for the useEffect hook?
answers: Start or stop a timer based on changes to state
Subscribe to a chat service when a component loads

questions.prompt: When and why should we use a cleanup function with useEffect?
answers: If we have a long running function that we want to stop running when our component is no longer the page
Any time we make a network request with fetch
